sentence: economists have long recognized that the skills of the workforce are an important source of economic growth.

sentence: education and the challenges facing america today the educational challenges our society faces should be considered in the context of three broad trends: the retirement of the baby-boom generation, the inexorable advance of the technological frontier, and the ongoing globalization of economic activity.
